title: cygan
author: cygan

content: as you may have seen here, my Bitcoin sticker collection is growing unstoppable and it is not avoidable that some duplicates are found. now i would like to give them away to you with a free raffle there are 5 different sticker lots (each lot contains 10 stickers) to win:lot 1Ã°Å¸â€˜â€¡lot 2Ã°Å¸â€˜â€¡lot 3Ã°Å¸â€˜â€¡lot 4Ã°Å¸â€˜â€¡lot 5Ã°Å¸â€˜â€¡rules:choose a number between 00-99users with the rank 'newbies' are excluded from the free rafflethe raffle starts when all numbers have been selected and i have chosen a blockone winner can only win one lotif a winner is determined more than once, the next block will determine the new winnerfreeshipping worldwide - all the stickers are shipped from eu00 - rat03gopoh01 - MrCryptHodl02 - icopress03 - thiago00704 - krogoth05 - 5tift06 - 07 - QuakerBull08 - 09 - Steeley10 - 11 - 12 - 13 - geophphreigh14 - 15 - montreal116 - 17 - wwzsocki18 - 19 - Fundamentals Of20 - 21 - The_Crypto_Kid22 - tread9323 - 24 - 25 - Humble Bitcoiners26 - MrMojoRising2627 - Doblezero28 - bct_ail29 - 30 - 31 - okimzti32 - 33 - Eclipse3334 - -doubleU-35 - debutant36 - NeuroticFish37 - Dernoste38 - 39 - 40 - hotdog741 - 42 - tweetious43 - 44 - Darker4545 - 46 - BTCOVERFIATS47 - mx12.levins48 - 49 - Jcga50 - minerjones51 - 52 - aoluain53 - 54 - PeakDK55 - iced56 - 57 - 58 - 59 - PreciousMetapsICT60 - 61 - LDL62 - PawGo63 - Real-Duke64 - 65 - 66 - CoinEraser67 - 68 - 69 - Hookzup170 - 71 - YodasRedRocket72 - 73 - 74 - Willi997475 - sunnybwoy76 - MoparMiningLLC77 - Amax1678 - 79 - Crytocanuk80 - 81 - Mbitr82 - CoinageMint83 - haloxon84 - inthelongrun85 - turbodogma86 - 87 - 88 - bitbollo89 - owlcatz90 - naira91 - 92 - 93 - Cryptogreatdane94 - 95 - 96 - salad daging97 - Becassine98 - Remsjack99 - andulolika
